participant_1.background:
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
i love non gmo foods.
i would like to try sky diving.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.

participant_2.background:
I love to support my local community by buying fresh produce from the farmers market.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago.
i enjoy watching baseball.
my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
Doing well, thanks for asking! Just got back from the farmers market, and I'm looking forward to cooking some meals with the fresh produce I bought.
Oh that's awesome! I love going to the farmers market too. I always feel good about supporting my local community.
Me too! And it's so much better than buying produce from the grocery store. The produce is always so fresh, and it tastes so much better.
I agree! I also love that you can usually find some really unique and interesting produce at the farmers market. I recently found some heirloom tomatoes that were amazing.
Oh that sounds delicious! I love trying new things. I'm always on the lookout for new and interesting produce to cook with.
Me too! I think it's so important to eat a variety of fruits and vegetables. It's good for your health, and it also makes your food more interesting.
I totally agree! I try to eat as many fruits and vegetables as I can, but it's not always easy.
I know what you mean. It can be hard to find the time to cook healthy meals, especially when you're busy.
Yeah, that's definitely a challenge. But I try to make it a priority, because I know it's important for my health.
Good for you! I think it's really important to make healthy choices, even when it's hard.
I agree! I'm glad we're on the same page about this.
